misc: Loves basketball even more than Marcus, making some fans wonder if he's a real golfer
biography: Pasi, affectionately known as "Susi-Pasi", is a notable figure hailing from Vuosaari Golf Helsinki. He is set to make his fourth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, marking another chapter in his ongoing engagement with this esteemed tournament. To date, Pasi has one Hector Trophée victory to his name, a testament to his capabilities as a pair player.

Beyond the greens, Pasi harbors a fervent passion for basketball, perhaps even surpassing that of his colleague Marcus. This devotion to basketball sometimes leads fans to playfully question whether Pasi is, in fact, a true golfer at heart. Such lighthearted speculation only adds to Pasi's enigmatic persona.

The upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 presents a fresh opportunity for Pasi to further demonstrate his golfing prowess and perhaps add another victory to his record. While he is yet to claim the Victor Trophy, his consistent presence and dedication to the sport make him a player to watch.
